data.client_settings: - Android: 5.3.8, Desktop: Current release (sorry, can't find version number anywhere?)
data.actual_result: The user ID in a stringified mention from an android device only has numbers, no preceding exclamation mark
data.expected_result: The mention using the android client should include an exclamation mark preceding the user ID in a stringified mention
data.short_description: Mentioning a nicknamed account on Android doesn't prefix the user ID with an exclamation mark in the message's content
data.steps_to_repro: - Setup a simple bot to view messages - Nickname an account - Mention the nicknamed account on desktop, observe the presence of an exclamation mark preceding the user ID in the mention - Mention the nicknamed account using the android app, observe the lack of such exclamation mark
